summary: Tesla's latest software update has added YouTube Music and Amazon Music, as well as Parental Controls.

title: YouTube has delivered an important update to its audio eraser tool
content: YouTube is helping creators more easily remove copyrighted audio.
summary: YouTube is helping creators more easily remove copyrighted audio.
